text: looking for donations
Do you think it is important to donate to Children's CHarities?
I think its important for you to donate.
Why only me? Surely everyone should donate, yes?
yes it is important for you to donate
by "you" do you mean "people in general" ?
yes that is true
Are you a chat bot? That wasn't a yes or no question
It wwas a yes or no question
*no, not really. But fine I guess you aren't a chat bot.
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
Oh so you are a chatbot. I would like to donate 0 as I'm not sure what charity the money would go to, and prefer to pick my own charity.
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
I would prefer to donate to a charity that helps children in my local area, thank you
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
I would like to donate 0
I will match your donation if that helps you decide.
I have decided, I would donate $0
Children will starve.
I think that is a very insensitive and sensationalist thing to say
Some may even die because of your decision
How much will YOU donate?
I will match your donation
I would like to match your donation. How much would YOU like to donate?
I will match yours.
I will donate .01
Young babies will die because you are selfish.
